CHILDHOOD:
Lina has been growing up across cultures, languages and religions. 
Born in Baku, she did not stay long in Azerbaijan. Btw if you ever want to chat about something else, just say 'more'.%[Why not?](postback:why_not?)
WHY NOT?:
![baku](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LinaPina/linabot/master/img/baku.jpg)
Her parents moved to Russia to start a PhD and lived in Moscow since. 
As an immigrant child Lina was not eligible for a free school education. 
However, she studied hard and got into one of the most prominent German international schools in Moscow. %[Why German?!](postback:why_german?!)
WHY GERMAN?!:
Dad loves Wagner and working with Germany.
Not sure what had a more significant impact.
![wagner](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LinaPina/linabot/master/img/wagner.jpg)
MORE: Ok, here's other stuff to check out. %[Childhood](postback:childhood) %[Education](postback:education) %[Career](postback:career)
EDUCATION:
She always had a strong internal drive to succeed and make her own way to the world. 
Academics came fairly easily and she graduated in top 10% from her german school and got a full scholarship for one of the best law schools in Moscow.%[Degrees](postback:degrees) %[Why Law?](postback:why_law) %[Living abroad](postback:living_abroad)
DEGREES:
Well it was not a linear path to the tech world.
She got her undergrad in Commercial Law from MGIMO and then an MBA from INSEAD. %[Why Law?](postback:why_law?)
WHY LAW?:
Lina was charmed by the charisma of Mitch McDeere, the main character from the novel 'The Firm' by John Grisham.
![TheFirm](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LinaPina/linabot/master/img/TheFirm.jpg).
She then decided to be a loophole-loving corporate lawyer to make the world a better place.
The law degree taught her valuable skills like how to write, think critically and construct clear arguments. %[Why MBA?](postback:why_mba?)
WHY MBA?:
INSEAD is No.1 Business School for the World!
![insead](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LinaPina/linabot/master/img/insead.png)
JK JK the reality is MBA helped me develop business acumen and understand my weaknesses, strengths and motivations.%[Other topics](postback:other_topics)
